text:
Xiaomi announced the budget smartphone Redmi Note 8T with NFC
06 Nov 2019, 11:05 by Daria Gromova
Available model with 5 cameras.
At a presentation in Madrid, Xiaomi officially showed the Redmi Note 8T - the European version of Redmi Note 8. Smartphones are almost identical, but the 8T got an NFC sensor for contactless payments and a different texture for the back panel.



Otherwise, the characteristics are the same: a 6.3-inch FHD + display with Corning Gorilla Glass 5 protection and a drop-shaped notch for a 13 MP selfie camera and four cameras at the back with a 48 MP sensor at the base.



The heart of the Redmi Note 8T is the Snapdragon 665 AIE processor - powerful enough to extend the operation of the 4-megapixel camera at 48 megapixels. The battery with a capacity of 4,000 mAh with support for fast charging via USB-C is responsible for autonomy. An 18 W adapter is included.



The smartphone is available in only one modification 4 + 64 GB and costs 199 euros (‚âà14 050 rubles). In Spain and Italy, it will appear on November 8, the date of the Russian release and the official price have not yet been disclosed.
